abstract:
English-language titles and abstracts
Systematic reviews of the clinical efficacy or adverse event rates of long-acting opioids in patients with chronic non-cancer pain, OR 2. Randomized controlled trials that compared one of the long-acting opioids listed above to another long-acting opioid, a short-acting opioid, a non-opioid, or placebo in adult patients with chronic non-cancer pain, OR 3. Randomized controlled trials and observational studies that reported adverse event rates for one of the long-acting opioids listed above.
